  • About

Flu-Reporter presents a view of web search volume on flu related information that people did in past 7 days. Search volume is displayed as a number. In the scale of 0 to 100, the closer to 100 the number is, the more searches are entered. It indicates the increasing public concerns and flu cases.

As default, Flu-Reporter provides the data at user's current location. But you can also check search trend across various regions on all regions page.

These data may assist public health department in flu season, or help general users.

* Data Source: Google Trends
